law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 335, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2031a-3, 2031a-4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Procedure for approval of lease -- Bond of guardian.
